--Scryed--

Scryed bows, and steps back as Talos speaks to Hot Rod. <I'll wait 
my turn.>


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He arrived outside Talos' office, and tapped the control that 
allowed him to address anyone inside.
> 
> "Commander, it's Hot Rod. One of the bots from the recovered 
stasis pods is active and would like to see you."
> 
> {Talos}
> 
>     After a few moments the metallic door swung into the wall with 
a light hiss revealing the intwerior of the room to the two bots, 
Talos sat behind a desk looking over the duty roster once more 
trying to see if he forgot anyone for duties. Looking up he waved 
the two bots in.
> 
>     "Good to see your mission was a success Hot Rod." He said 
simply before turning his full attention to them both, "Your next 
assignment is more of surveillance. One of the predicons captured by 
Sunhawk had a surprising story to tell, seems she claims to be an 
old friend of yours. To verify her claim I've granted her sanctuary 
here with us and assigned you to keep an eye on her."
> 
>     Turning to look at Hot Rod's companion he nodded, "Welcome to 
my ship, I'm Talos."
